name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iWeaver AI -  Summarize YouTube, PDF and Web Articles.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize YouTube videos, Web articles and PDFs with one click, intelligently generate mind maps, and chat with iWeaver AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

iWeaver AI can collect any web articles  and summarize YouTube, PDF, web articles and MP3.

Summarize YouTube videos, online articles and PDFs with one click, intelligently generate mind maps, and chat with iWeaver AI. Record timestamps and screenshot notes. Highlight text on any web page. Quickly collect key points of web to build own personal knowledge system. 

For more details, please visit our website: https://www.iweaver.ai.

🎉 Key Features:

● Time-saving: Quickly select and save to your personal knowledge base with just one click.
● Insightful: Define your online content summary for a fast related topics.
● Transcription Empowerment: Record intelligent notes with video or audio timestamps and capture screenshots effortlessly.
● AI Chat: Pose challenging questions to iWeaver AI and receive in-depth answers about specific content or your whole knowledge base.
● Web Summaries: one-click for a webpage overview summary, with word definition function for precise key point understanding.
● Mind Map: Smartly Generate exportable Mind Maps for visual Knowledge Expansion.
● AI Translation: Get content key points without language barriers once and for all.
● AI Driven Knowledge Reusage: Any content you saved could be recalled and reused for content creation like articles, summaries, Q&As, abstracts, emails, and more.

👉🏻 How to Use:
● Visit any website to get information.
● Click the icon of iWeaver at the top right of your Chrome browser.
● Click on the "Summarize" button to get quick insights of this page's content.
● Type your questions or commands in the chatbox to engage in intelligent conversations with iWeaver AI to get answers or create tasks.
● Click on the "Memo" option to see automatically saved content, or add labels to it.
● Click on the "AI Chat" tab  Access this page through recommended questions on the "Summary" page.
● Select specific content on the page to save and collect.

Transform your online content and knowledge acquiring experience with iWeaver AI! 🚀
